name: anomaly.exe
description:
Your are the last robot of an abandonned company... but wait no, you are not alone!

Fight against the others robots and get the best score! 
Want to play with a friend? He just have to grab a controller and press any key when the game starts!

Controls: 
Move: WASD / Left Stick  
Aim: Mouse / Right Stick
Shoot: Left Click / Right Thumb
Chain Hook: Right Click / Left Thumb
